## Background

Evals can be a dry subject: data pipelines, metrics, LLM-as-a-judge calibration. But that doesn't mean we can't have fun with it.

I've been collecting these memes while teaching our [AI Evals course](https://evals.info){target="_blank"}. If you've ever stared at a "100% pass rate" and felt suspicious, or watched someone reach for a new vector database before running a single eval, you'll probably relate.

## Memes

Click on any image to open it full-size. Feel free to steal these for your team's Slack.

If you want something more serious, check out the [Evals FAQ](https://hamel.dev/blog/posts/evals-faq/){target="_blank"} or the [Evals Flashcards](../flashcards/){target="_blank"}.

:::

```{python}
#| echo: false
#| output: asis
#| cache: false

from pathlib import Path
from IPython.display import HTML, display

# Get all image files from directory (exclude cover.png)
meme_dir = Path(".")
images = sorted([f.name for f in meme_dir.iterdir()
                 if f.suffix.lower() in ['.png', '.jpeg', '.jpg']
                 and f.name != 'cover.png'])

# Put midwit.png first as it's a good intro meme
images = ['midwit.png'] + [img for img in images if img != 'midwit.png']

total = len(images)

download_svg = '''<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 24 24" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" fill="none"><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" d="M4 16v1a3 3 0 003 3h10a3 3 0 003-3v-1m-4-4l-4 4m0 0l-4-4m4 4V4"/></svg>'''

slide_template = '''<div class="carousel-slide" data-index="{index}">
  <div class="slide-header">
    <span class="slide-counter">{num} / {total}</span>
    <a href="{image}" download class="slide-action-btn" title="Download">
      {download_svg}
    </a>
  </div>
  <a href="{image}" target="_blank" class="slide-link">
    <img src="{image}" alt="Evals meme {num}" loading="lazy">
  </a>
</div>'''

html = '''
<div class="carousel-container">
  <div class="carousel-track" id="carouselTrack">
'''

for i, img in enumerate(images):
    html += slide_template.format(
        image=img,
        index=i,
        num=i+1,
        total=total,
        download_svg=download_svg
    )

html += '''
  </div>

  <button class="carousel-btn carousel-btn-prev" id="prevBtn" aria-label="Previous">
    <svg viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2">
      <path d="M15 18l-6-6 6-6"/>
    </svg>
  </button>

  <button class="carousel-btn carousel-btn-next" id="nextBtn" aria-label="Next">
    <svg viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2">
      <path d="M9 18l6-6-6-6"/>
    </svg>
  </button>
</div>
'''

display(HTML(html))
```
